overview: This film is set in the 1930s, and starts with a strange murder in a beautiful Jiangnan river delta. At the scene, all that is left is an exquisite pair of embroidered shoes. An innocent seamstress is suspected and put to death, but the bloody murders do not stop..

production_companies.name: Star Union Skykee (Beijing) Film & Media Advertisement
Anhui Golden Bull Film & TV Investment

title: Blood Stained Shoes
